Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Absence of proof is not proof of absence

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: A self-made man? Yes, and one who worships his creator

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: The darkest day, if you live till tomorrow, will have passed away

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: They whom truth and wisdom lead, can gather honey from a weed

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Man may dismiss compassion from his heart, but God never will

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is a good name for an effect whose cause is God

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Remorse, the fatal egg that pleasure laid

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it worth while to observe that there are no Venetian blinds in Venice?

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: What the American public wants in the theater is a tragedy with a happy ending

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: Inequality is as dear to the American heart as liberty itself

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: He who sleeps in continual noise is wakened by silence

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the still, small voice that the soul heeds, not the deafening blasts of doom

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people can stay longer in an hour than others can in a week

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of the man who is universally interesting is that he is universally interested

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: How is it the great pieces of good luck fall to us?

Quote.Author: William Dean Howells
Quote.QuoteValue: Primitive societies without religion have never been found

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice delayed is justice denied

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Selfishness is the greatest curse of the human race

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Here is my first principle of foreign policy: good government at home

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: All the world over, I will back the masses against the classes

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not a life at all. It is a reticence, in three volumes

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: No man ever became great or good except through many and great mistakes

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: No one ever became great except through many and great mistakes

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that is morally wrong can be politically right

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Good laws make it easier to do right and harder to do wrong

Quote.Author: William E. Gladstone
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot fight against the future. Time is on our side

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Fix your eyes on perfection and you make almost everything speed towards it

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Error is discipline through which we advance

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: The home is the chief school of human virtues

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the quantity but the quality of knowledge which determines the mind's dignity

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is governed by opinion

Quote.Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote.QuoteValue: No one should part with their individuality and become that of another

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: To buy very good wine nowadays requires only money. To serve it to your guests is a sign of fatigue

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't insult your intelligence by suggesting that you really believe what you just said

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I profoundly believe it takes a lot of practice to become a moral slob

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Scientists are people who build the Brooklyn Bridge and then buy it

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my instincts are reprehensible

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The best defense against usurpatory government is an assertive citizenry

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A Conservative is a fellow who is standing athwart history yelling 'Stop!'

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to take you seriously, but to do so would affront your intelligence

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: We love your adherence to democratic principles

Quote.Author: William F. Buckley, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: All adventure is now reactionary

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: Finishing a good book is like leaving a good friend

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: No man is a failure who is enjoying life

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: A man must not deny his manifest abilities, for that is to evade his obligations

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: Setting a good example for your children takes all the fun out of middle age

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: The reward of energy, enterprise and thrift is taxes

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of the person who can't be bothered by details

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles

Quote.Author: William Feather
Quote.QuoteValue: He isn't a real boss until he has trained subordinates to shoulder most of his responsibilities

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Time moves in one direction, memory in another

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The future has already arrived. It's just not evenly distributed yet

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Language is to the mind more than light is to the eye

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The 'Net is a waste of time, and that's exactly what's right about it

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happiest with people who've gotten furthest from traditional ideas of nationalism

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The box was a universe, a poem, frozen on the boundaries of human experience

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always interested in the spooky repurposing of everyday things

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead station

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't begin a novel with a shopping list - the novel becomes my shopping list as I write it

Quote.Author: William Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: The people I hang out with tend to use Macs, not that I think they're necessarily superior

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: I think education is both using and improving knowledge and that changes the whole picture

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to change attitudes, start with a change in behavior

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: You can acquire a lot of knowledge without ever going to school

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: What students lack in school is an intellectual relationship or conversation with the teacher

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: No human being will work hard at anything unless they believe that they are working for competence

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is totally wrong and terribly harmful if education is defined as acquiring knowledge

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: Effective teaching may be the hardest job there is

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: Caring for but never trying to own may be a further way to define friendship

Quote.Author: William Glasser
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't marry someone you would not be friends with if there was no sex between you

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: He that loves reading has everything within his reach

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Revolutions are the produce of passion, not of sober and tranquil reason

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The philosophy of the wisest man that ever existed, is mainly derived from the act of introspection

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is probable that there is no one thing that it is of eminent importance for a child to learn

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The proper method for hastening the decay of error is by teaching every man to think for himself

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Study with desire is real activity; without desire it is but the semblance and mockery of activity

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: If a thing be really good, it can be shown to be such

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything understood by the term co-operation is in some sense an evil

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice is the sum of all moral duty

Quote.Author: William Godwin
Quote.QuoteValue: What can be more clear and sound in explanation, than the love of a parent to his child?

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: My yesterdays walk with me. They keep step, they are gray faces that peer over my shoulder

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: What a man does defiles him, not what is done by others

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep is when all the unsorted stuff comes flying out as from a dustbin upset in a high wind

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: Language fits over experience like a straight-jacket

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood is a disease - a sickness that you grow out of

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: Man produces evil as a bee produces honey

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always understood the Nazis because I am of that sort by nature

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: When I wrote 'Lord of the Flies' - I had no idea it would even get published

Quote.Author: William Golding
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather there wasn't an afterlife, really. I'd much rather not be me for thousands of years

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaks and whispers are a daily routine of news-gathering in Washington

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: The burnt odor in Washington is from the disintegrating authority of the governing classes

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans cannot teach democracy to the world until they restore their own

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: Nevertheless, I resist cynicism and continue to believe in the possibilities for genuine democracy

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: In this country you can say aloud or publish just about anything you like

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: If we have wealth, it will be protected from inflation and possibly even enhanced in value

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: The economy is not governed with the bottom half in mind

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: In 1900 Americans on average lived for only 49 years and most working people died still on the job

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: Children born today have a fifty-fifty chance of living to 100

Quote.Author: William Greider
Quote.QuoteValue: The do-it-yourself version of pensions is a flop, as many Americans have painfully learned

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: I have found that I get a better reaction from people once I am less bothered about their reaction

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I've never inherited a penny!

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one growth strategy: work hard

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: A generation of children has been betrayed

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: Egypt is a sovereign nation

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always thought that foreign-policy idealism has to be tempered with realism

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: For the security of the UK, it matters a lot for Somalia to become a more stable place

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not, nor is anybody I know in government part of a nasty right wing clique

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Britain would be alright, if only we had a different Government

Quote.Author: William Hague
Quote.QuoteValue: One day I will go back to my books and piano, but not yet

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: The more we do, the more we can do

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Good temper is one of the greatest preservers of the features

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Grace has been defined as the outward expression of the inward harmony of the soul

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: The busier we are the more leisure we have

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not fit that every man should travel; it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Love turns, with a little indulgence, to indifference or disgust; hatred alone is immortal

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: No one ever approaches perfection except by stealth, and unknown to themselves

Quote.Author: William Hazlitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Zeal will do more than knowledge

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: As the Republican platforms says, the welfare of the farmer is vital to that of the whole country

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure to accord credit to anyone for what he may have done is a great weakness in any man

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Enthusiasm for a cause sometimes warps judgment

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Anti-Semitism is a noxious weed that should be cut out. It has no place in America

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Presidents come and go, but the Supreme Court goes on forever

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't write so that you can be understood, write so that you can't be misunderstood

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics makes me sick

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with me is that I like to talk too much

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: A government is for the benefit of all the people

Quote.Author: William Howard Taft
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is not going to be saved by legislation

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: We'd like to prearrange our life on all levels. We'd prefer it to be scripted. But it's not

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to prove a point. That point is, actors are artists, not narcissists necessarily

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: What's really frustrating with movies is the lack of improvement

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a father, being a friend, those are the things that make me feel successful

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: My greatest offering is my concept. It isn't my face

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: Rage with panache

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't put the truth in a cage. I try to find a way to release it

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: Defeating fear is not a light switch. For most of us, it's daily work

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't exercise, you don't stay strong. I like to work with talented people

Quote.Author: William Hurt
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only sit on the frustration of wanting to express something for so long

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured with what is right in America

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Promising too much can be as cruel as caring too little

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I came of age believing that, no matter what happened, I would always be able to support myself

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Poor Darrell Hammond. What's he going to do when I leave office?

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Strength and wisdom are not opposing values

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: When we make college more affordable, we make the American dream more achievable

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: Character is a journey, not a destination

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't eaten at a McDonald's since I became President

Quote.Author: William J. Clinton
Quote.QuoteValue: We must teach our children to resolve their conflicts with words, not weapons

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the man who disciplines himself strictly can stand for long the terrific pace of modern war

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Conscription if necessary, but not necessarily conscription

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Once a nation parts with the control of its credit, it matters not who makes the laws

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Usury once in control will wreck the nation

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Let it be remembered, too, that at a time of war, nearly every one is under great strain

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: It is what we prevent, rather than what we do that counts most in Government

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortunately, the Canadian people in all their habits, are essentially a temperate people

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Every hour of useful work is precious

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: Workers in industry are the partners in war of the fighting forces

Quote.Author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe my greatest service is in the many unwise steps I prevent

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: In a start-up company, you basically throw out all assumptions every three weeks

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: I divide all readers into two classes: those who read to remember and those who read to forget

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a strange reluctance on the part of most people to admit they enjoy life

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: The final test of a gentleman is his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: If I didn't start painting, I would have raised chickens

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the secrets of life is to keep our intellectual curiosity acute

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: The happiest people in this world are those who have the most interesting thoughts

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century

Quote.Author: William Lyon Phelps
Quote.QuoteValue: A cat pours his body on the floor like water. It is restful just to see him

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: A good laugh is sunshine in the house

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: When I walk with you I feel as if I had a flower in my buttonhole

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: Bravery never goes out of fashion

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible, in our condition of Society, not to be sometimes a Snob

Quote.Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your honest convictions and be strong

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not want art for a few any more than education for a few, or freedom for a few

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me love and work - these two only

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: The reward of labour is life. Is that not enough?

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cannot learn to love real art, at least learn to hate sham art and reject it

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: No man is good enough to be another's master

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: To do nothing but grumble and not to act - that is throwing away one's life

Quote.Author: William Morris
Quote.QuoteValue: I am going, if I can, to be an architect, and I am too old already, and there is no time to lose

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The Constitution is not neutral. It was designed to take the government off the backs of people

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: It seemed to me that I had barely reached the Court when people were trying to get me off

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell the FBI that the kidnappers should pick out a judge that Nixon wants back

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: We are a religious people whose institutions presuppose a Supreme Being

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Common sense often makes good law

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not sit as a superlegislature to weigh the wisdom of legislation

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature should not be suppressed merely because it offends the moral code of the censor

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The liberties of none are safe unless the liberties of all are protected

Quote.Author: William O. Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: No patent medicine was ever put to wider and more varied use than the Fourteenth Amendment

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The value of experience is not in seeing much, but in seeing wisely

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: Soap and water and common sense are the best disinfectants

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: The greater the ignorance the greater the dogmatism

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: Look wise, say nothing, and grunt. Speech was given to conceal thought

Quote.Author: William Osler
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the first duties of the physician is to educate the masses not to take medicine

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth often suffers more by the heat of its defenders than the arguments of its opposers

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Passion is the mob of the man, that commits a riot upon his reason

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: For death is no more than a turning of us over from time to eternity

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the people think they govern and they will be governed

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Kings in this world should imitate God, their mercy should be above their works

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Rarely promise, but, if lawful, constantly perform

Quote.Author: William Penn
Quote.QuoteValue: Only trust thyself, and another shall not betray thee

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of education is the knowledge not of facts but of values

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no rewards or punishments - only consequences

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Worry is interest paid on trouble before it comes due

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: A man may build himself a throne of bayonets, but he can't sit on it

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever marries the spirit of this age will find himself a widower in the next

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: Originality is undetected plagiarism

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: No Christian can be a pessimist, for Christianity is a system of radical optimism

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: True faith is belief in the reality of absolute values

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: To become a popular religion, it is only necessary for a superstition to enslave a philosophy

Quote.Author: William Ralph Inge
Quote.QuoteValue: The enemies of freedom do not argue; they shout and they shoot

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes paranoia's just having all the facts

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: My relationships with my cats has saved me from a deadly, pervasive ignorance

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Language is a virus from outer space

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fake quality any more than you can fake a good meal

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is true, everything is permitted

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing

Quote.Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote.QuoteValue: After one look at this planet any visitor from outer space would say 'I want to see the manager.'

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: Never assume the obvious is true

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: The right to do something does not mean that doing it is right

Quote.Author: William Safire
Quote.QuoteValue: Last, but not least, avoid cliches like the plague
